description: This Python script initializes a vector database with PDF documents (CVs), sets up a knowledge base, and performs a query with filters using an agent. It involves downloading sample data, configuring Pinecone vector database, and managing document metadata.

classes.name: PineconeDb
classes.description: A class representing the Pinecone vector database connection and operations.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class managing a collection of PDF documents and their metadata within a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that handles querying the knowledge base and generating responses based on user input.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for testing and returns their file paths.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response based on a query and specified filters.
